comments.author: George Bridgeman
comments.message:
Thank you so much for this. Turned this option on by accident when trying to close a tag! On large monitors it slows CF Builder (Mac version) to an absolute crawl and gobbles all available CPU.

George.

comments.message: Thank you George!!!  I was searching for "coldfusion builder slows to a crawl" which brought this thread up.  I never would have guessed it was the whitespace!  Thank you thank you thank you.  I was going out of my mind.
